name: Eyal Golan
description: '''Eyal Golan''' ({{langx|he|אייל גולן}}; born '''Eyal Bitton'''; 12 April 1971) is an Israeli singer who sings in the [[Mizrahi music]] pop fusion genre and considered one of the most successful singers in Israel. Golan reported the highest income of all singers in Israel in 2011.
